GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
HID: mcp2221: prevent a buffer overflow in mcp_smbus_write()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 3c0f8a59f2cc8841ee6653399a77f4f3e6e9a270, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 67a95c21463d066060b0f66d65a75d45bb386ffb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: mcp2221: prevent a buffer overflow in mcp_smbus_write()
OSV.details:
